page.title: 03OMNIBUS DEPOT S.HEDINGHAM
page.content: On the 30th April we went to {Hedingham Omnibus Depot.}The owner Mr. Mc'Gregor was not there so we asked the secretary some questions about the company. A{bus}driver came in and we asked him what happened when the buses broke down.He said that they have their own repair garage. He also told us that every{bus}travels about 300 miles a day. Then we went outside to look at the buses. We saw lots and lots of different types. We went and looked inside a{Double Decker bus}and went upstairs to the top deck. They run more{Single Deckers}than{Double.} We also saw a very old{bus.}The registration number was EX 6566.It was a{Double Decker}and it had no seats,it was being preserved. We collected some{bus}tickets and leaflets for our project.
